md:
giải nghĩa từ "retrace" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

- Retrace (verb) : 
	+ Meaning: to find and follow the path or route that someone or something took in the past
	+ Example: The police retraced the suspect's steps to figure out where he had gone.
	+ Related words: track, follow, trace

- Retrace (verb) : 
	+ Meaning: to do something again, especially in order to correct a mistake or improve something
	+ Example: I had to retrace my steps and redo the entire project because of the error.
	+ Related words: redo, revise, correct

- Retrace (verb) : 
	+ Meaning: to draw or paint something again, especially in order to improve it
	+ Example: The artist retraced the lines of the portrait to make it more lifelike.
	+ Related words: redraw, repaint, recreate
html:
giải nghĩa từ "retrace" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Retrace (verb) :

    • Meaning: to find and follow the path or route that someone or something took in the past
    • Example: The police retraced the suspect's steps to figure out where he had gone.
    • Related words: track, follow, trace

  • Retrace (verb) :

    • Meaning: to do something again, especially in order to correct a mistake or improve something
    • Example: I had to retrace my steps and redo the entire project because of the error.
    • Related words: redo, revise, correct

  • Retrace (verb) :

    • Meaning: to draw or paint something again, especially in order to improve it
    • Example: The artist retraced the lines of the portrait to make it more lifelike.
    • Related words: redraw, repaint, recreate
